name: Blackened Flower Brigade
description:
This game is made for CopperCube abstract jam.

"Blackened Flower Brigade" is a 3D first-person shooter game set in a dystopian future where the earth is controlled by a powerful corporation. Players take on the role of a member of the anti-conformist hippie group. He has been caught and thrown into a prison under the corporation's control. The goal is to escape the dungeon and regain freedom by fighting against the corporation's forces.

Controls:

WASD - move

left click - fire

1, 2, 3, 4 - select weapon

Known issues:

  • AI doesn't always work as expected;
  • Enemies sometimes do not play death animation;
  • Invisible objects sometimes appear for no apparent reason:)
  • The game sometimes crashes if some sounds are played;
